snippet.title: Exographer - Release date trailer - PC, Switch, PS5, Xbox
snippet.description:
Enjoy the new Exographer trailer, an exploration adventure developed by SciFunGames and published by Abylight Studios, releasing September 26th 2024. Join InI on a rescue mission to an alien planet and discover a forgotten civilization, the Natitans.

Exographer is based on platforms and puzzles, with backtracking and lots of exploration, metroidvania style, and everything in the game is imbued by science. Designed by physicist Raphael Granier De Cassagnac, every power, character, location and puzzle you encounter in the game is related to particle physics. But the beautiful thing about Exographer is that you won’t need scientific knowledge to enjoy this adventure.

Exographer features beautiful pixel art, with 6 different atmospheres and more than 20 levels, and music by Yann Van Der Cruyssen (Stray). 
Enjoy Exographer on PC Steam, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5 and Xbox next September 26th.
